name: Clowns Dot to Dot
description:
Welcome to the largest spectacle on Earth! Blini Games presents Clowns: Dot to Dot, for smartphones and tablets. A game to enjoy funny moments and characters of the circus. Connect the dots in order, learn the numbers and the names of the dinosaurs.

• Translated to 7 different languages: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Portuguese & Russian.

• Enjoy funny moments and characters of the circus. Clowns, elephants, knifethrower. Highly detailed handmade pictures.

• Totally Free to Play!!!!

• A classic puzzle game for the whole family and for children from 3 years old.
